ClassDesc: Exposes an API for components to send messages to other nodes. Messages are delivered to connected network nodes. A message is considered successful if it has been queued for delivery to the specified node. A message will only be queued if the specified node is connected. The @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#DataApi_E@ should be used for messages to nodes which are not currently connected (to be delivered on connection). Messages should generally contain ephemeral, small payloads. Use @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#DataApi_E@ to store more persistent or larger data efficiently. A message is private to the application that created it and accessible only by that application on other nodes.
